game_description: A game were you are a robot, and you can socialize with other players. Easy and simple! there are 3 maps right now, and all 3 of them you can meet friends in!
review_1: How do you get third person camera in this game I want to have third person camera
review_2: The game is amazing but there’s only like 5 people online at a time so I think you should advertise to get more people just like msmdd did! If you do that before you start the campaign release a “im an OG” badge in the shop so the OG’s could be recognized and respected.
review_3: It’s not bad but I feel like there is already another robot copy of this it’s just this one is better but it’s so confusing bc it’s super overrated and I feel like all the comments are fake and they are all talk and at the end of the day they both kinda suck
review_4: More people need to play dis game it is very fun with a full lobby
review_5: I love robots and gorilla tag so this is the perfect match for me. I believe this will be the best gorilla tag fan game ever one day!
